section.22: The Book on Virtues of Jihad

hadiths.text: Narrated Sahl bin Sa'd As-Sa'idi: That the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "Going out in the morning in the cause of Allah is better that the world and what is in it. And the place (the size) of a whip in Paradise is better than the world and what is in it." [Abu 'Eisa said:] There are narrations on this topic from Abu Hurairah, Ibn 'Abbas, Abu Ayyub, and Anas. This Hadith is Hasan Sahih
